name: Ternary Slime
description:
Have you ever thought about when 1+1=3? It's impossible in mathematics but perfectly works when we understand it differently! If each "1" means an individual, then "1+1" means "Many hands make light work" -- teams are always more powerful than an individual. Or the "1" means one unit in ternary?

In this game, you will perform slimes to combine and split to escape from the laboratory. You can combine when there are two or more slimes and split when you have a large star slime. All slimes can jump and move. Try your best to solve the puzzles and help the slime team escape!

Control:

WASD = Move

E = Combine

Q = Split

Click = Choose One Slime to Control

This game is a submission for ArtCenter Fall 2022 Entertainment Jam.

Team Kuromi: Charlotte Guo, Xinyan Wang, Qinyun Song.
